comments.author: Dave
comments.body: It's curious, the things that sort themselves through the baleen of iSean's (alleged) mind and drop w/ a lifeless thud into his mark-as-funny bin. Like this picture of me putt-putting down the north side of the double-wide last summer. What's to laugh? Where iSean sees elastic failure and corpulence intertwined in an unholy alliance, GettyImages sees raw sensuality and the triumph of man... at least that's what they told me when they cut the check. Well, an IOU, actually. Roasting in Austin, DU
